transcript:
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Sir good evening sir.
Customer: Sir vanakkam sir.
Executive: Anna Krishna pesurenga India martle irunthu manager pesuren eppidi irukinga?
Customer: Sari sir.
Executive: Thank you sir thank you sir Rohini manager last day oru two days pesunangale sir Rohini.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Sari sir oru pathu nimisham kalichi ok sirangala?
Customer: Puriyala sir pathu nimisham pathu nimisham kalichi pesalama sir.
Executive: Sari sir 10 minutes kalichi kupidra ungaluku.
Customer: Ok ok ok.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to talk after 10 minutes.



Resolution:

- Executive agreed to call after 10 minutes.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call after 10 minutes.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- follow up, call back
